## üìñ Description  
In this project. We're going to: 
- Build automated pipeline (e.g. AWS
CodePipeline, Jenkins, GitHub)
- Containerize applications using tools like Docker and
Kubernetes
- Turn cloud infrastructure as a code with Terraform & AWS
Cloudformation.
